title: 2018 Syrian Cup
text:
The 2018 version of the <a href="Syrian%20Cup">Syrian Cup</a> is the 48th edition to be played. It is the premier knockout tournament for <a href="association%20football">football</a> teams in <a href="Syria">Syria</a>. <a href="Al-Wahda%20SC%20Damascus">Al-Wahda</a> are the defending champions.
The competition has been disrupted because of the ongoing <a href="Syrian%20Civil%20War">Syrian Civil War</a>, where some games have been awarded as 3:0 victories due to teams not being able to compete.
The winners of the competition will enter the <a href="2019%20AFC%20Cup">2019 AFC Cup</a>.
